thread.title: Kat Von D shared sneak peeks of her vegan shoe collection coming out this year
thread.title_full: Kat Von D shared sneak peeks of her vegan shoe collection coming out this year

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: Kat Von D shared sneak peeks of her vegan shoe collection coming out this year
text:
Kat Von D shared sneak peeks of her vegan shoe collection coming out this year In the latest revelation of one of her many projects, Kat Von D shared a sneak peek of her vegan shoe collection on Instagram early this morning, causing even more suspense for when the line is fully released. While we still don’t have the details on when exactly this elusive line of footwear will be released, we’ve been waiting in anticipation since Kat Von D announced her vegan shoe line during the beginning of December.
What we know for sure, at this point, is that Kat Von D has refined and specific tastes when it comes to vegan and cruelty-free fashion , and her penchant for bold and vintage-inspired looks will likely inform the designs for her personal line.
Of course, now that the designs are in the question stands: how long will we be forced to wait? Finally turned in all the content for my #vegan shoe line I plan on launching this year! Now maybe my office can go from looking like a serial [shoe] killer's place back to normal. For now. [been listening to "Mind Idea" by Jeremy Enigk on repeat for the past week, so figured it would be good to add it to this vid] 
A video posted by Kat Von D (@thekatvond) on Jan 18, 2017 at 11:28pm PST 
Our girl, hard at work.
Kat Von D / www.instagram.com Hopefully, this will be a spring release. Especially considering how well those sketches would pair with spring dresses.
Kat Von D / www.instagram.com At a glance, her sketches give us ample hope for chunky heels with all manner of straps. Final sketches of shoes I'm designing for my #vegan shoe line are due tomorrow!! Been drawing all day non-stop! But I HAD to take a cuddle-party break with this cute little fucker. #piaf #distraction #cuddleslut #thedrawingboard #whenyoureyeshadowmatchesyourcat #casavond 
A photo posted by Kat Von D (@thekatvond) on Dec 8, 2016 at 6:23pm PST 
So many options.
Kat Von D / www.instagram.com Look at that sketch? We can totally see ourselves wearing these for breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
Kat Von D / www.instagram.com Perhaps some of the designs will be informed by the styles found in her spacious shoe closet. Now that the drawings are in, we’re counting on a release sooner than later!
